snippet: A former justice minister from Gambia, Fatou Bensouda, became the new prosecutor of the International Criminal Court in The Hague on Friday.
abstract: Fatou Bensouda, a former justice minister from Gambia, becomes the new prosecutor of the International Criminal Court in The Hague.
lead_paragraph: A former justice minister from Gambia, Fatou Bensouda, became the new prosecutor of the International Criminal Court in The Hague on Friday.

headline.main: The Hague: New Prosecutor Sworn In
